description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Narrative by Major-General John Campbell of his Operations in the Hill Tracts of Orissa, for the suppression of human sacrifices and female infanticide.]" Author: CAMPBELL, John - Major-General, C.B Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010057.h.8.", "British Library OC T 11252", "British Library OC T 19117" Page: 240 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1864 Publisher: Hurst & Blackett Edition: [Another edition.] A Personal Narrative of Thirteen Years Service amongst the Wild Tribes of Khondistan for the Suppression of Human Sacrifice. [Revised and in part rewritten. With plates and a map.] Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000585614 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
